content: प्रामाणिक {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (की|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) {@--1@} Established by proof, founded or resting on authority. {@--2@} Founded on the authority of scriptures (शास्त्रसिद्ध). {@--3@} Authentic, credible. {@--4@} Relating to a प्रमाण <ab>q. v.</ab> --कः {@--1@} One who accepts proof. {@--2@} One who is conversant with the Pramāṇas of the Naiyāyikas, a logician. {@--3@} The head of a trade.
